reviewText: I'm harping in other reviews about the condition of the dvds (Amazon didn't publish my two reviews on collections that showed up scratched, even though purchased brand-new and through Amazon..Buffy being one of them) but this collection is fine.Fletch and Fletch Lives are what I would call "Sunday afternoon" movies, as there is a bit of a plot to tie the comedy bits together, and its silliness brings out the kid in everyone..a good laugh generator and a great price.
summary: Flawless dvds, combined with CC silliness for the win!
Title: The Fletch Collection

reviewText: This movie is a classic. One of the funniest movies that Chevy Chase has ever done. If you haven't seen it, then you don't know what you are missing.

reviewText: This movie was funny and I really enjoyed watching it. Chubby Chase just really made me laugh a lot. He is just so naturally funny. This movie I watch over again. It's just that funny.
Title: The Fletch Collection

reviewText: One of Chase's great roles!  Fletch was so great when I saw it, I loved the film, and it was quite popular.  Chase dresses up in numerous disguises, and the one that he was the "roller skating guru" I didn't even realize it was him.  I suppose if you're not a fan of Chase, or didn't know who he was, you might not be impressed with this outing.  Some of his references are also going to be lost on today's viewer.  However, the film is fun.  The follow up isn't as good, but if you like the first one, you'll like the second one too.
Title: The Fletch Collection

reviewText: This is one of my wife's favorite movies.  Just what she wanted for Christmas. Two movies for a very low price.
Title: The Fletch Collection

reviewText: Chevy Chase is good in almost everything.  I am a big fan of most of his movies.  Great actor and entertainer.

reviewText: It's Chevy, so you know it's gonna be pretty good.The Fletch movies aren't his best work, but they are good for some laughs.While you won't say either movie is a blockbuster, you won't be disappointed either.

reviewText: "It takes a Big man to admit your wrong ,  and I'am no big man ."That is one of my favorit lines in the movie. With all his disguises,he is the ultimate B S artist,and he's good . Very Funny

reviewText: I liked "Fletch" more than 'Fletch Lives'.  "Fletch" was very funny, with witty dialog, just as in the book by Gregory McDonald.

reviewText: This is a must have for a Chevy fan. His intelligent style of comedy mixed in with his costumes is great.

reviewText: I bought this set because my husband really liked the movies.  It was the first time I'd seen them.  They were pretty good.  Decent plots and plenty of humor.  I would recommend them and I know my husband definitely would.  He loves them.
Title: The Fletch Collection

reviewText: As a child of the 80's there are certain characters that I grew up with. Fletch happens to be one of those which brings me back to a time in my life which includes many fond memories. Having said that, Chevy Chase does a great job of creating a character which is silly, slap-stick, sarcastic, yes serious when required. In some ways, it's the essence of a solid, casual film from my youth which I fondly enjoy when possible. Give Fletch a try, I dare you!
Title: The Fletch Collection

reviewText: Two great Chase movies, with Classic Chevy .... man of many disguises, and inuendos ... why he was so popular on SNL and these type of movies ... very funny stuff

reviewText: If you like chevy chase you have to own this set. Will make you laugh for both movies. Great movies.

reviewText: I love Chevy Chase and this one is very funny.  He definitely doesn't need anyone else to make you laugh.

reviewText: I can't explain why we love this so much! We have grown up with Chevy Chase and have been laughing ever since. We had to have the collection in our house. Title: The Fletch Collection

reviewText: Got The Fletch Collection in the mail from Amazon yesterday (8/20/08). Fletch is the same exact disc that is found in the "Jane Doe" edition and Fletch Lives is the same blue disc as in the previous dvd release, that is still available for purchase. The set is almost identical to the "Jane Doe" edition in the sense that there's a slip cover and a single dvd case with a "flipper". There is no digi-pak here folks. The only special features are the same ones on the "Jane Doe" edition. Fletch is in 5.1 Dolby and Fletch Lives only has 2.0 Dolby. Both are in 1.85:1 anamorphic.Great buy if you don't own either or if you want to upgrade to save a slight bit of space.
summary: A Fletch Collection DVD short review
Title: The Fletch Collection
